description: M i s c e l l a n y   ( J u d a h   b e n   S o l o m o n   H a r i z i ' s   ʻ A n a ḳ ;   Y i t s h ̣ a k ̣   H a l e v ̣ i ' s   p o e m s   a n d   a n   a s t r o n o m i c a l   f i g u r e )
title: Miscellany (Judah ben Solomon Harizi's ʻAnaḳ; Yitsḥaḳ Haleṿi's poems and an astronomical figure)
